isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - INSTALL - CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Install Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 55 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: With the front cab door trim panel (Item 1) being held away from the front cab door (Item 2), connect electrical connectors (Item 3) onto electric window and door lock switch (Item 4). If so equipped, connect electrical connector (Item 5) onto electric mirror switch, driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 54 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position front cab door trim panel (Item 1) in place at the front cab door (Item 2), driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 53 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Once front cab door trim panel is positioned at the front cab door, install eight push-in fasteners (Item 7) through front cab door trim panel (Item 3) into front cab door. Make sure all push-in fasteners have center portion in the locked position securing front cab door trim panel to the front cab door Figure 53, view arrow B , driver side shown.

Install inner door pull cup (Item 2, view arrow A) into the front cab door trim panel (Item 3, view arrow A). Install two torx head screws (Item 1, view arrow A), driver side shown. Tighten to 20 to 24.5 Lbf-in (2.3 to 2.8 N•m).
Install two torx head screws (Item 4) recessed in map pocket (Item 5) of front cab door trim panel (Item 3), driver side shown. Tighten to 20 to 24.5 Lbf-in (2.3 to 2.8 N•m).
Repeat procedure to install passenger side front cab door trim panel with electric door window and locks.

svcsubproc.title: Install Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 54 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position front cab door trim panel (Item 1) in place at the front cab door (Item 2), driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 56 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Once front cab door trim panel is positioned at the front cab door, install eight push-in fasteners (Item 8) through front cab door trim panel (Item 3) into front cab door. Make sure all push-in fasteners have center portion in the locked position securing front cab door trim panel to the front cab door Figure 56, view arrow B , driver side shown.

Install inner door pull cup (Item 2, view arrow A) into the front cab door trim panel (Item 3, view arrow A). Install two torx head screws (Item 1, view arrow A), driver side shown. Tighten to 20 to 24.5 Lbf-in (2.3 to 2.8 N•m).
Install two torx head screws (Item 4) recessed in map pocket (Item 5) of front cab door trim panel (Item 3), driver side shown. Tighten to 20 to 24.5 Lbf-in (2.3 to 2.8 N•m).

Install retaining clip onto window regulator handle (Item 6), then install window regulator handle onto window regulator handle shaft until retaining clip locks into groove in the window regulator handle shaft, driver side shown.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side front cab door trim panel with manual door window and locks.

svcsubproc.title: Install Crew Cab Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 59 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: With the rear cab door trim panel (Item 1) being held away from the rear cab door (Item 2), connect electrical connectors (Item 3) onto electric window and door lock switch (Item 4), driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 58 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position rear cab door trim panel (Item 1) in place at the rear cab door (Item 2), driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 57 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Once rear cab door trim panel is positioned at the rear cab door, install eight push-in fasteners (Item 7) through rear cab door trim panel (Item 3) into rear cab door. Make sure all push-in fasteners have center portion in the locked position securing rear cab door trim panel to the rear cab door Figure 57, view arrow B , driver side shown.

Install inner door pull cup (Item 2, view arrow A) into the rear cab door trim panel (Item 3, view arrow A). Install two torx head screws (Item 1, view arrow A), driver side shown. Tighten to 20 to 24.5 Lbf-in (2.3 to 2.8 N•m).
Install two torx head screws (Item 4) recessed in map pocket (Item 5) of rear cab door trim panel (Item 3), driver side shown. Tighten to 20 to 24.5 Lbf-in (2.3 to 2.8 N•m).
Repeat procedure to install passenger side rear cab door trim panel with electric door window and locks.

svcsubproc.title: Install Crew Cab Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 58 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position rear cab door trim panel (Item 1) in place at the rear cab door (Item 2), driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 60 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Once rear cab door trim panel is positioned at the rear cab door, install eight push-in fasteners (Item 8) through rear door trim panel (Item 3) into rear cab door. Make sure all push-in fasteners have center portion in the locked position securing rear cab door trim panel to the rear cab door Figure 60, view arrow B , driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 60 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Install inner door pull cup (Item 2, view arrow A) into the rear cab door trim panel (Item 3, view arrow A). Install two torx head screws (Item 1, view arrow A), driver side shown. Tighten to 20 to 24.5 Lbf-in (2.3 to 2.8 N•m).
Install two torx head screws (Item 4) recessed in map pocket (Item 5) of rear cab door trim panel (Item 3), driver side shown. Tighten to 20 to 24.5 Lbf-in (2.3 to 2.8 N•m).

Install retaining clip (Item 13, Figure 62 onto window regulator handle (Item 6), then install window regulator handle onto window regulator handle shaft until retaining clip locks into groove in the window regulator handle shaft, driver side shown.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side rear cab door trim panel with manual door window and locks.
